title: Flowers

description.plain:
“Flowers” is the lead single from Miley Cyrus' eighth studio album Endless Summer Vacation. The song speaks about her past relationship with ex-husband Liam Hemsworth, releasing the track on his birthday, with lyrics implying she doesn’t need him to fulfill her happiness.

Cyrus first teased the new era with cryptic posters in certain cities in the world that featured lyrics and a release date. Fans were skeptical about it, until she later dropped the first teaser on New Year’s Eve, along with announcing the single’s title and release date. Minutes later, a second teaser was released.

A music video for the single was accompanied with the single’s release.

embed_content: Read “Flowers” by Miley Cyrus on Genius

body.plain:
“Flowers” is the lead single from Miley Cyrus' eighth studio album Endless Summer Vacation. The song speaks about her past relationship with ex-husband Liam Hemsworth, releasing the track on his birthday, with lyrics implying she doesn’t need him to fulfill her happiness.

Cyrus first teased the new era with cryptic posters in certain cities in the world that featured lyrics and a release date. Fans were skeptical about it, until she later dropped the first teaser on New Year’s Eve, along with announcing the single’s title and release date. Minutes later, a second teaser was released.

A music video for the single was accompanied with the single’s release.
